meanings.definition: a public spectacle in which a bull is fought by a matador
meanings.sent1: The bullfight was a thrilling event at the arena.
meanings.sent2: People gathered to watch the bullfight in the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The bullfight turned into a chaotic scene when the bull decided to nap instead of fight.
meanings.sent4: Her struggle with the difficult math problem felt like a mental bullfight.
meanings.sent5: The vivid red cape fluttered in the air during the intense bullfight.

meanings.definition: to engage in or watch a bullfight
meanings.sent1: They planned to bullfight during the festival.
meanings.sent2: We cheered as the matador prepared to bullfight.
meanings.sent3: He bullfights every summer to feel the adrenaline rush.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a fierce bullfight against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The crowd roared with excitement as they watched the skilled matador bullfight.
